author: Ubisoft
description:
Unlock new weapon rewards such as the Frostwail, new furniture rewards, and unique event cosmetics.

About Skull and Bones:
Enter the perilous world of Skull and BonesTM, where you play by your own rules to rise from a nobody to become the most fearsome pirate kingpin. Craft a variety of unique ships, forge unlikely alliances, and take part in thrilling naval battles as you overcome the odds and bring mayhem on the seas. Be part of an immersive world that introduces new challenges and features every season. 

#Ubisoft #SkullandBones 

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

© 2025 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered trademarks in the US and/or other countries.
title: Skull and Bones: Azure Solstice Event Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description:
Experience the ultimate Pandora adventure in the Western Frontier. Play as So'lek, a warrior Na'vi fighting against the RDA and the ruthless Ash Clan to save his family.
 Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - From the Ashes, coming December 19, 2025. 
Preorder today: https://ubi.li/2zc56

Pre-order now and get the Floating Mountains bonus content, including three different color patterns to customize your banshee and immerse yourself further in the Western Frontier.

Requires the base game to play.

Play as So’lek, a Na’vi warrior who has found solace with the Sarentu. Just as peace settles over the Western Frontier, a new threat rises: the RDA, now allied with the Ash clan, who are ruthless Na’vi bent on annihilation. Ambushed and left for dead, So’lek awakens to a scorched land and his new-found family scattered. With new third-person gameplay, embark on So’lek’s journey as he vows to find his family and exact revenge on those who wronged him.

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.co
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora – From the Ashes: LAUNCH TRAILER
